name: Abs
description: Abdominal muscles including rectus abdominis, obliques, and transverse abdominis

name: Arms
description: Upper and lower arm muscles including biceps, triceps, and forearms

name: Chest
description: Pectoral muscles including pectoralis major and pectoralis minor

name: Back
description: Back muscles including latissimus dorsi, rhomboids, and trapezius

name: Legs
description: Leg muscles including quadriceps, hamstrings, and calves

name: Glutes
description: Gluteal muscles including gluteus maximus, medius, and minimus

name: Core
description: Deep core muscles including transverse abdominis and erector spinae

name: Full Body
description: Comprehensive exercises that engage multiple muscle groups

name: Cardio
description: Exercises designed to elevate heart rate and improve cardiovascular health
